name: OATS CHICKEN HALIM
cooking_method: Put 2 tablespoon of Sunflower oil on a fry pan and hit it.
Put ½ cup onion in the hot oil.
When the onion turns a bit brown, mix Cloves, Bay leaves, Cardamom and Cinnamon.
Now add Chili Powder 1 teaSpoon, Turmeric powder ½ teaSpoon, Garlic Paste 1 teaSpoon and Ginger Paste 1 teaSpoon. Pour some water.
Now add chicken, Garam Masala Powder 1 teaSpoon, Coriander Powder 1 teaSpoon, Cumin powder ½ teaSpoon and ½ cup of water. Cover the fry pan for 10-15 minutes.
Now add Halim Mix Masala 1 teaSpoon, A mixture of 3 kinds of Dal ½ Cup, 1 cup of water and salt. Cover the fry pan again for a couple of minutes.
Add Oats ½ cup, green Chili 4-5 pcs, Coriander Leaves.
The Halim is ready now. You can serve it by adding friend onion and ginger if you like.

name: TEHRI IN MUSTARD OIL
cooking_method: First, marinate all the ingredients with the meat and keep it for three to four hours.
Then wash the rice and soak it in water for half an hour.
Now heat the mustard and soybean oil together and fry the onion brown add the merinated meat mixture and cover it by adding some water.
Once the meat is cooked, sprinkle chopped raw peppers and powdered milk and cook for a little and take it down.
Now boil water in another pan with 7 cups of water and hot spices.
Cover the boiling water with rice, lemon juice, powdered milk, sugar and salt.When the rice is boiled, add chopped raw chilli and sauté for 20 minutes.
Then pour the cooked meat in boiled rice and mix it well.
keep it for 15 minutes in low heat and its ready to serve.

name: LABRA
cooking_method: First of all wash the vegetables cut and boil them lightly.
Now give all the spices to the vegetables.
Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the dried pepper and take down.
Now give the Bay Leaves and Mix Spice in oil and stir for one minute.
Now fry the onion brown and pour the oil in vegetable mix.
Cook it for 2-3 minutes and when the grave get thick take it down.

name: MUTTON CURRY
cooking_method: Firstly mix hot spices powder, coriander powder, chilli powder and ginger-garlic paste in a dish.
Now put a pressure cooker add butter and put it on the stove.
When the butter are melted, add onion, chilli, and meat then mix it well.
Now stir the mixture of spices in the flesh.
Cover the pressure cooker after adding salt, water and lemon juice in meat.
When the pressure cooker gets 5/6 whistles, take it down and serve hot.

name: FISH CHACCHORI
cooking_method: First of all in a pan add green chilli and onion to the oil.
Mix all the spices with water in another bowl and pour it into the pan.
Now slowly add some more water and make a fried gravy.
When the spices are ready , pour the fish and mix them slightly again.d gravy.
When all the water becomes dry,pour the chopped coriander leaves and take down the pan.d gravy.

name: HILSHA FISH ONION CURRY
cooking_method: First, fry the fish after marinating with pinch of salt and turmeric.
Take another pan, put oil on it, add all spices and water then cook it.
Add pieces of tomato in spices and stir.
Add fried fishes in spices and stir softly.
Now add green chillies and pieces of tomato , give it a mix and cook in low flame.
When oil will start to separate , it is ready , serve it on a dish.
